name: bdc-i18n-migration
description: I18n migration scripts for the BDC project

scripts.extract:all: npm run extract:frontend && npm run extract:backend
scripts.migrate:all: npm run migrate:frontend && npm run migrate:backend
scripts.migration:complete: npm run extract:all && npm run update:translations && npm run migrate:all && npm run validate
scripts.migration:dry-run: npm run extract:all && npm run update:translations && npm run migrate:frontend:dry && npm run migrate:backend:dry

author: BDC Development Team
